QuestData.Title: No Hesitation, No Surrender
QuestData.Description:
I cannot fathom where the constructs acquired these reinforcements, but we are once again outnumbered. I seethe at the thought of my fallen disciples.
You will make this right.
The renegades have established a foothold in the northern region of the temple. Their necrotic magic has granted them a shield, defending them from ranged assault. Disable it.
Let nothing impede you. This is the way of Courage.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet the Paragon of Courage at the temple precipice.
QuestData.RewardText: This will begin to set things right.
